name: Being Alone
description:
Being alone is an Apocalyptic pc games.

In this game, you'll have to survive from apocalyptic world by searching food, health suplies.

You can also receive money by killing the mutant and buy some accessoris like, hat, mask, health suplies item, upgrade combat skill. 

BEING ALONE has a stories that you should to know. This stories after the nuclear world war. Most people infected by the radiation and other people survive from this. But, its not the end. There is a mutant and ready to kill you anytime and anywhere. Your mission is kill all mutant and unlock next map/mission.

I have to say this, that first skill combat cant be priority as a default combat. You should earn much money to buy next skill combat. And the secondary combat is useful to be default combat.

Another thing that maybe interesting is you can play main mode to earn money.

Keyboard rules :

- X : change weapon 

- C : crouch

- Z : stand 

- F : flashlight on

- L : flashlight off

- E : pick item 

- T : open bag 

There is 3 weapon you should to know.

- axe 

- machete 

- machine gun 

The machine gun, not on your item or you can pick that. 

Machine gun located some area that you should bring the mutant and shoot them. Press E to use the machine gun and Q to release.

Please donate to make another awesome games and i'll write your name on credit scene :)
